channel.title: Crash at fightpits
channel.description: Hi there! I got a problem with my server, It only happens to a few people on the server at others it works fine,... soo... if i want to go to jad or whatever in the fightpits my game crashes... it just keeps saying loading........... If i log out and then back in it stays black so then i have to set my coordinates by hand but im not 100% at my pc xD so if others get the problem i cant fix? whats this .. HELP :mad:

item.title: Crash at fightpits
item.dc:creator: @nieksantol nieksantol
item.description:
@nieksantol wrote:

its just silab client. it works at my friend who uses the same :S

Read full topic

item.title: Crash at fightpits
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Your client doesn’t support the NPC’s or Object’s in that area.

Read full topic

item.title: Crash at fightpits
item.dc:creator: @nieksantol nieksantol
item.description:
@nieksantol wrote:

nop its just my acc i can login but it keeps on loading… please wait and screen is black, restarting doesnt work it ALWAYS happens at me and most others can play it fine

Read full topic

item.title: Crash at fightpits
item.dc:creator: @wmashda3000 wmashda3000
item.description:
@wmashda3000 wrote:

it might be compatibility issues with your client, if you cant log in just restart the server and you should be able to log in again.

Read full topic

Hi there!
I got a problem with my server, It only happens to a few people on the server at others it works fine,…
soo… if i want to go to jad or whatever in the fightpits my game crashes… it just keeps saying loading…
If i log out and then back in it stays black so then i have to set my coordinates by hand but im not 100% at my pc xD so if others get the problem i cant fix? whats this … HELP :mad:
